attributes.action: Crematoriums for Hindu Community to cremate family members as per Hindu rites
attributes.additional_details: There are many Crematorium which do not provide religious facilities for Hindu Community to cremate their dear departed. Community feels that Hindus are discriminated even in their death.
attributes.background: Hindu Community in UK have no facilities in UK to cremate their dead as per Hindu Customs and Religious rites. Hindu Community seeks Crematoriums to provide full facilities or Government builds new crematoriums after consulting Hindu Community to identify needs of the Community.
